all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Transfer Function
all_findings.description: Function `transfer()` is transfer without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function transfer(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Transfer Function
all_findings.description: Function `transferFrom()` is transfer without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function transferFrom(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Approve Function
all_findings.description: Function `approve()` is approve without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function approve(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Read-only reentrancy risk
all_findings.description: View function at line 89 reads state that may be inconsistent during reentrancy

evidence.recommendation: Consider reentrancy guard for view functions reading critical state

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in _mint
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in _burn
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send) without proper validation

all_findings.title: Fee-on-transfer token not handled
all_findings.description: Transfer at line 45 assumes full amount received

evidence.recommendation: Check actual balance change for fee-on-transfer tokens

all_findings.title: Liquidity provision without minimum check
all_findings.description: Liquidity addition at line 99 lacks minimum amount validation

evidence.recommendation: Add minimum liquidity requirement to prevent dust attacks

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on transfer()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function transfer(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setOperator(address operator, bool approved) public virtual returns (bool) 
+ function setOperator(address operator, bool approved) public onlyOwner virtual returns (bool)
